metadata.title: CVE-2018-8793 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function cssp_read_tsrequest() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8793` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rdesktop - 1.8.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
